lines: Hello there! Welcome to the world of Pokémon!
My name is Oak! People call me the Pokémon Prof!
This world is inhabited by creatures called Pokémon!
For some people, Pokémon are pets. Other use them for fights.
Myself... I study Pokémon as a profession.
First, what is your name?
Right! So your name is PLAYER
This is my grandson. He's been your rival since you were a baby.
...Erm, what is his name again?
That's right! I remember now! His name is RIVAL.
Your very own Pokémon legend is about to unfold!
A world of dreams and adventures with Pokémon awaits! Let's go!
Hello, this is the first thing I'm gonna say.
And then I'm gonna say this too. Oh boy isn't this exciting
Then by some freak of a miracle, I am ALSO going to say this too. Isn't life wild?
Okay im done bye
Yo what's goodie
Okay cool beans
buh bye dood
AYOOOOOO
SHERMIE IN DA HOUSE
We may have lost the battle...
but not the war...
ouch! that hurt!
Ah! Blasted right through the shield!
Player, we're being invaded by malware!
Help me take them out so we don't lose our jobs!
NoooooOOOOoOOOoOOOO!!!
Welcome to Sandbox Mode!
Click the buttons on the top right to spawn enemies!
My adventure begins at the peaceful Navitend Farm.
A place of harmony,
Little did I know, This world was about to change forever.
As the sun sets, a strange silence falls over the farm.
As I look up, sensing the impending threat, I was ready to protect my home.
After defending my home,
I must navigate To the city.
Streets once filled with joy are now battlegrounds.
The Nexus's cyber minions attack, Hacking everything.
With each step, I vow to restore peace to the city's heart.
After defeating the minions attacking the city.
determined to halt the invaders, I advance before they reach space.
Surrounded by the vastness of the sky, I face the aerial fleet
Each cloud a witness to the fierce battle between hope and despair.
With the wind as a ally, I maneuvers through this wild battlefield,
This skyward clash is but a prelude to the greater war looming in the stars.
Now in orbit, I defend Earth from a relentless barrage,
shielding my home from the debris of war and cyber threats.
Each attack is intercepted, each enemy vanquished, brings hope.
Earth hangs in the balance, its fate tied to Shermie's bravery.
The orbit becomes a dance of danger and defiance, Shermie leading the way.
The chase continues back to the enemy's lair, the boss spaceship.
Level 5 filler
Level 6 filler
Level 7 filler
